author: zc4str0
content:
I have 22 years old, I'm very curious person and I am always interesting on some topic about technology. I'm still very very beginner on blockchain/Ethereum topics, but I'm not afraid to learn everyday! Now the current question I struggle to understand is: "What still needs to be improved to Ethereum become a world widely-used platform?" and "Why no one uses it if is it so disruptive? What still needs to be done?"

I would love to talk with anyone about those topics, please don't be shy!
